dialogues.text: Oh man... I'm so startled. I was attacked by this big crab in Sunset Cove...
Oh, you found my axe! Thank you so much! It's a family heirloom so it is very valuable to me.
My family specializes in crafting axes. I would like to give you an axe that we've made as token of gratitude. You can use it to chop down certain trees.
If you would like to know more about the Woodcutting skill, you should go north along Sunset Cove beach. You will find Douglas. Good luck!
